items.description: Spiced potatoes and peas in a crispy pastry wrapper. Served with a chana masala

items.name: Vegetable Pakora
items.description: A selection of vegetables and paneer coated in a chickpea flour batter and deep fried

items.name: Onion Bhajia
items.description: Crispy onion rings which are coated in a spiced chickpea flour and deep fried.

items.name: Fish Pakora
items.description: Seasoned white fish which is coated in a spiced chickpea flour and deep fried.

items.name: Chicken Breast Pakora
items.description: Seasoned chicken breast which is coated in a spiced chickpea flour and deep fried.

items.name: Chef Platter Basket
items.description: A combination of vegetable, fish and chicken pakoras served with a mint chutney.

items.name: Butter Chicken Fries
items.description: A plate of french fries which are coated in our butter chicken gravy

items.name: Poppadom

items.name: Salads
items.description: hey

items.name: Seasonal Salad
items.description: Fresh lettuce, tomatoes, olives, onions and paneer all tossed together.

items.name: Mango Salad
items.description: Chopped green mango tossed with onions, sweet peppers, mint leaves, coriander and lime juice, and topped wth roasted cashew nuts.

items.name: Taj Salad
items.description: Cheese, red onions, sweet peppers, mint leaves, coriander and lime juice, topped with seasoned chicken breast strips.

items.name: Tandoori Chicken

items.description: Boneless chicken pieces marinated with Afghan spices and cream.

items.description: Fresh chicken breast pieces which have been marinated in a mildly spiced cream based sauce.

items.description: Spiced ground lamb which has been mixed with a unique blend of fresh herbs and broiled over hot coals.

items.description: Spiced ground chicken which has been mixed with a unique blend of fresh herbs and broiled over hot coals.

items.name: Chana Masala

items.description: Paneer cubes battered and fried with chillies, ginger, garlic, spring onions and a fiery chilli sauce.

items.description: Battered pieces of boneless chicken which is wok fried with chillies, ginger, garlic, spring onion and bell peppers in a chilli sauce

items.description: Plain basmati rice rice cooked with traditional Indian spices.

items.description: hey

items.description: One of the staples of Indian cuisine, a unique flatbread made with refined flour.

items.name: Garlic Naan
items.description: Traditional Indian flatbread which has been cooked with garlic.

items.name: Roti
items.description: A thin disc of bread made with unleavened whole wheat. Also known as a 'chapathi'.

items.name: Lachcha Paratha
items.description: A type of bread made with whole wheat and baked with methi (fenugreek)

items.name: Garlic Chilli Naan
items.description: A traditional naan bread which has been cooked with garlic and chilli

items.description: A traditional Indian naan bread which is stuffed with potatoes.

items.description: A traditional Indian naan bread which has been stuffed with dry fruits, nuts, coconut and paneer.

items.name: Raita

items.name: Mango Chutney
items.description: A sweet made from a unique blend of spices and mango.

items.name: Plain Yoghurt
items.description: A traditional accompaniment to any Indian meal, used to cool your pallet after a spicy curry.

items.name: Achar (Pickles)
items.description: A traditional blend of bitter and spiced fruits and vegetables which have been preserved in a unique blend of spices.

items.description: hey

items.name: Mango Kulfi
items.description: A traditional Indian desert similar to ice cream, made with french vanilla and mango flavouring.

items.description: One of India's favorite deserts, small dumplings made from cream cheese, flavored with cardamon, and stewed in a hot sugar syrup.

items.description: French vanilla flavoured ice cream served with strawberries, chocolate and caramel.
